## Quarto

## LASSO

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width = "70%"}

### LASSO model = RSS + $\lambda \sum_{j = 1}^{p} \beta_{j}^2$

where $\lambda$ is the tuning parameter, to improve interpretability, use penalty to perform feature selection

- cross validation selected $\lambda = 0.01$

```{r, echo=FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidymodels)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```
